existingWallet.title: Existing Wallet
existingWallet.description: Import wallet with a 24 secret recovery words

watchAccount.title: Watch Account
watchAccount.description: For monitor wallet activity without recovery phrase

keystoreFile.title: Keystore File
keystoreFile.description: Restore wallet using password-encrypted backup file

bip39.title: BIP39 Mnemonic
bip39.description: Generate a new wallet using BIP39 mnemonic phrase

slip0039.title: SLIP-0039
slip0039.description: Generate a wallet using multi-share recovery

privateKey.title: Private Key
privateKey.description: Generate a wallet from a private key

create.title: Generate Recovery Phrase
create.backupConfirm: I have backed up my recovery phrase securely

verify.title: Verify Recovery Phrase
verify.subtitle: Confirm Your Backup
verify.instructions: Enter the missing words to verify you've correctly backed up your recovery phrase

secretKeyGenerator.title: Secret Key Generator
secretKeyGenerator.backupCheckbox: I have backed up my secret recovery phrase

warning.title: SECURITY WARNING
warning.secure: Keep this phrase completely secure and private
warning.access: Anyone with access to this phrase can access your cryptocurrency
warning.noOnline: Never share this phrase online or store it digitally
warning.multipleBackups: Store multiple physical copies in secure locations
warning.testRestore: Verify you can restore your wallet before sending funds

instructions.title: Recovery Instructions:
instructions.writeDown: Write down these words in the exact order shown
instructions.store: Store this backup in a safe, dry place
instructions.test: Test recovery before transferring large amounts
instructions.noPhotos: Never take photos or make digital copies

footer.warning: This document contains sensitive cryptographic material. Handle with extreme care.

warning.title: SECURITY WARNING
warning.secure: Keep these keys completely secure and private
warning.access: Anyone with access to the private key can access your cryptocurrency
warning.noOnline: Never share these keys online or store them digitally
warning.multipleBackups: Store multiple physical copies in secure locations
warning.testImport: Verify you can import these keys before sending funds

instructions.title: Usage Instructions:
instructions.writeDown: Write down these keys exactly as shown
instructions.store: Store this backup in a safe, dry place
instructions.test: Test key import before transferring large amounts
instructions.noPhotos: Never take photos or make digital copies

footer.warning: This document contains sensitive cryptographic material. Handle with extreme care.

passwordSetup.title: Set Password
passwordSetup.subtitle: Secure Your Wallet
passwordSetup.description: Create a strong password to encrypt and protect your wallet. This password will be required every time you access your wallet.

errors.lowercase: At least one lowercase letter required
errors.uppercase: At least one uppercase letter required

passwordSetup.securityNote: Your password encrypts your wallet locally. If you lose it, you'll need your recovery phrase to restore access.

encryption.title: Encryption Strength
encryption.description: Determines the combination of cryptographic algorithms used to secure your wallet.

hashing.title: Password Hashing
hashing.description: Controls how your password is processed to derive the encryption key. Higher values are more secure but slower.

basic.title: Standard Encryption
basic.subtitle: AES-256
basic.description: Basic, fast, and widely-used encryption algorithm.

enhanced.title: Hybrid Encryption
enhanced.subtitle: AES-256 + KUZNECHIK
enhanced.description: Enhanced security combining AES-256 with the GOST standard KUZNECHIK.

quantumResistant.title: Quantum-Resistant
quantumResistant.subtitle: AES-256 + KUZNECHIK + NTRUP761
quantumResistant.description: Highest security, designed to be resistant to attacks from quantum computers.

low.title: Low Memory
low.subtitle: 64KB RAM, 3 iterations
low.description: Minimal memory usage, suitable for low-end devices.

medium.title: OWASP Default
medium.subtitle: 6.5MB RAM, 2 iterations
medium.description: Recommended by OWASP for general use.

secure.title: Secure
secure.subtitle: 256MB RAM, 4 iterations
secure.description: High security with increased memory and iterations.
